name: Space Shooter (itch) (aayushmakharia)
description:
A 2D space shooter odyssey.

Modifications:

1) The player loses life on contact with any enemy.

2) The first level contains only straight shooters making the level easy.

3) The second level contains chasers and straight shooter.

4) The final level has chasers that spawn quickly along with the diagonal and straight shooters.

Credits:

Created by Aayush Makharia
